title: The Herald
description:
The Silver Surfer leads Marcia, Phil, Ben, and Charlie on a chase across the city and shows them what it really takes to be the herald of Galactus.

Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Ethan Peck as Reed Richards; Daniel Molina as The Silver Surfer.
author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
